sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Process list
sect1.para: This page shows information about a process and a list of its instances.

simplelist.member: To retire the process click the "Mark as Retired". This will allow existing instances to complete but will prohibit creating new ones.
To Change the process definition, click "Redefine" in the "Details" section. This will go to a page where new BPEL and WSDL files may be specified.
To test the process click the "Test" link in the "Details" section.
To view partner links click "Partner Links" in "Details" section.
To delete the process and its instances click "Delete all versions and instances" in "Details" section.
To sort by Instance ID click the "Run ID" column heading in the "Instances" section.
To sort by Instance state click the "State" column heading in "Instances" section.
To sort by error click the "Error" column heading in "Instances" section.

To view the audit trail of an instance's execution, click "Audit" on the Instance's row in the listing. Auditing must have been enabled for the process for this link to be available. This will go to a separate page which shows a step by step trace of the instance's progress to date.

To view the current status of an instance click "Status" on the Instance's row. This will go to a separate page showing the state of each activity of the instance, including variable values, partner links etc.
To select all instances from the list check "Select All".
Selected instances can be deleted by checking the "Delete".
Selected instance(s) can be restarted by checking "Restart".
Click to navigate among the list of instances.

sect3.title: Delete Instances
sect3.para: If this check box is checked, all instances of the process will be deleted.
